name: Hair Apprentice
summary:
Maintaining the presentation of the salon.
No previous experience is necessary as full training will be provided.
Desirable: GCSE Maths and English Grade 3/D.

name: Handcraft artist/Model/miniature maker/sculptor
summary:
You will need to assist the artist’s daily hand craft work including miniature and model making.
Original design, Drawing, Scratch build, Painting, Weathering,…

name: CAD Designer
summary: The successful candidate will have a challenging but immensely rewarding career with a group of amazingly talented individuals of model makers, scenic sculptors…

name: Junior Conservator
summary: This entry-level role is ideally suited for a recent graduate or an individual with some prior experience as a Conservator, Collections Assistant, or similar…
